name: Face Characteristics
author: Lisa DeBruine
description: Face stimulus characteristics from Psychological Science Accelerator project: To Which World Regions Does the Valence-Dominance Model of Social Perception Apply? <https://psyarxiv.com/n26dy>. To be used with [psa001_agg].    Faces from Ma, Correll, & Wittenbrink (2015). The Chicago Face Database: A Free Stimulus Set of Faces and Norming Data. Behavior Research Methods, 47, 1122-1135.   Full data and analysis scripts at <https://osf.io/jfwtr/>

variableMeasured.name: Target
variableMeasured.description: target image - first character designates race, second character designates gender, followed by a unique identifier that matches Target in the CFD dataset

variableMeasured.name: Race
variableMeasured.description: target self-identified race (A = asian; B = black; L = latinx; W = white)

variableMeasured.name: Age
variableMeasured.description: Estimate the approximate age of this person (in years) ranges 18.7 to 34.9
